dataList.name: Town-protecting Harpoon
dataList.desc:
[Effects apply only to #6 Deployed Identity]

Turn End: At less than 30% HP, gain 1 [Enhancement] next turn

simpleDesc.simpleDesc: Gain 1 Attack Power Up next turn

dataList.name: Town-protecting Harpoon+
dataList.desc:
[Effects apply only to #6 Deployed Identity]
Turn End: at less than 40% HP, gain 1 [Enhancement] next turn

Turn End: if there is a Staggered ally, gain +6 [Aggro] next turn and gain 4 [DefenseUp] next turn

simpleDesc.simpleDesc: Gain 1 Attack Power Up next turn
Gain +6 Aggro and 4 Defense Level Up next turn

dataList.name: Town-protecting Harpoon++
dataList.desc:
[Effects apply only to #6 Deployed Identity]
Turn End: at less than 50% HP, gain 1 [Enhancement] next turn

Turn End: if there is a Staggered ally, gain +6 [Aggro] next turn and gain 4 [DefenseUp] next turn

simpleDesc.simpleDesc: Gain 1 Attack Power Up next turn
Gain +6 Aggro and 4 Defense Level Up next turn

dataList.name: Cetacean Heart
dataList.desc:
On Hit against enemies with [Laceration] with an Attack Skill, gain 1 [Breath]. (3 times per turn for each character)
On Crit, 50% chance to not consume [Breath] Count (once per turn for each character; including E.G.O Skills and Counter Skills)
On Crit Heads Hit with a Base Skill: inflict +1 more of the negative effect with that Coin. (once per turn for each character; including E.G.O Skills and Counter Skills)

simpleDesc.simpleDesc: Gain 1 Poise
Chance to not lose Poise Count
Inflict 1 more of the negative effect

dataList.name: Broken Violin
dataList.desc:
[Effects apply only to #5 and #6 Deployed Identities]

At 45%- HP, gain 1 [AttackUp] and 1 [TakeHpHealIncrease] on Clash Win (2 times per turn for each character)

At 20%- HP, gain 1 [AttackUp] and 1 [TakeHpHealIncrease] on Skill Use instead (2 times per turn for each character)

simpleDesc.simpleDesc: Gain 1 Offense Level Up & 1 HP Healing Boost
Gain 1 Offense Level Up & 1 HP Healing Boost

dataList.name: Broken Violin+
dataList.desc:
[Effects apply only to #5 and #6 Deployed Identities]

At 65%- HP, gain 1 [AttackUp] and 1 [TakeHpHealIncrease] on Clash Win (2 times per turn for each character)

At 40%- HP, gain 1 [AttackUp] and 1 [TakeHpHealIncrease] on Skill Use instead (2 times per turn for each character)

When winning a Clash after 5+ Clashes, the Skill that won the Clash deals +(# of Clashes x 2)% damage (max 20%)

simpleDesc.simpleDesc: Gain 1 Offense Level Up & 1 HP Healing Boost
Gain 1 Offense Level Up & 1 HP Healing Boost
Deal more damage based on number of Clashes

dataList.name: Broken Violin++
dataList.desc:
[Effects apply only to #5 and #6 Deployed Identities]

At 65%- HP, gain 1 [AttackUp] and 1 [TakeHpHealIncrease] on Clash Win (2 times per turn for each character)

At 40%- HP, gain 1 [AttackUp] and 1 [TakeHpHealIncrease] on Skill Use instead (2 times per turn for each character)

When winning a Clash after 5+ Clashes, the Skill that won the Clash deals +(# of Clashes x 3)% damage (max 30%)

simpleDesc.simpleDesc: Gain 1 Offense Level Up & 1 HP Healing Boost
Gain 1 Offense Level Up & 1 HP Healing Boost
Deal more damage based on number of Clashes

dataList.name: Manor-shaped Music Box
dataList.desc:
[Effects apply only to the #1 Deployed Identity]

Turn End: when Staggered, recover from Stagger; then, at the next Turn Start, inflict 4 [Sinking] Potency and 4 [Sinking] Count to all enemies (once per Encounter; in Focused Encounters, on all Parts)

When defeating an enemy with [Sinking], 1 enemy with the least [Sinking] Count gains +2 [Sinking] Count (in Focused Encounters, the Part)

simpleDesc.simpleDesc: Inflict 4 Sinking Potency and Count against all enemies
The enemy with the least Sinking Count gains +2 Sinking Count

dataList.name: Butler Style Binding Arts
dataList.desc:
Turn Start: inflict 1 [Binding] against the enemy who recovered from Stagger last turn

On Hit from an ally with the highest HP percentage: if the target is Staggered, deal +7.5% damage for every Stagger Level.

simpleDesc.simpleDesc: Inflict 1 Bind on the enemy that recovered from Stagger
Deal more damage based on the target's Stagger LV

dataList.name: Butler Style Binding Arts+
dataList.desc:
Turn Start: inflict <style="upgradeHighlight">2</style> [Binding] against the enemy who recovered from Stagger last turn

On Hit from an ally with the highest HP percentage: if the target is Staggered, deal +<style="upgradeHighlight">10%</style> damage for every Stagger Level.

simpleDesc.simpleDesc: Inflict 2 Bind on the enemy that recovered from Stagger
Deal more damage based on the target's Stagger LV

dataList.name: Butler Style Binding Arts++
dataList.desc:
Turn Start: inflict <style="upgradeHighlight">3</style> [Binding] against the enemy who recovered from Stagger last turn

On Hit from an ally with the highest HP percentage: if the target is Staggered, deal +<style="upgradeHighlight">12.5%</style> damage for every Stagger Level.

simpleDesc.simpleDesc: Inflict 3 Bind on the enemy that recovered from Stagger
Deal more damage based on the target's Stagger LV

dataList.name: Refraction Glass Pod
dataList.desc:
Regular Encounters) On Hit against enemies with 10+ (sum of [Sinking] Count and Potency):
if the target is at -45 SP, deal ([Sinking] Potency on target) / 5) Gloom damage (3 times per Skill)

Focused Encounters) On Hit against enemies with 10+ (sum of [Sinking] Count and Potency):
deal ([Sinking] Potency on target) / 10) Gloom damage (2 times per Skill)

simpleDesc.simpleDesc: Deal Gloom damage based on Sinking on the target
Deal Gloom damage based on Sinking on the target

dataList.name: La Manchaland All-day Pass
dataList.desc: On Hit against targets with 10+ (sum of [Laceration], 'Unique Bleed', and [Burst]): gain 1 [Breath] Potency and Count (2 times per Skill)

simpleDesc.simpleDesc: Gain 1 Poise Potency and Count

dataList.name: Token of Victory
dataList.desc:
On Kill, 1 ally with the least SP heals 3 SP.

After Attack: if an enemy with 10+ (sum of [Laceration], 'Unique Bleed', and [Burst]) is defeated, 1 ally gains 2 [AttackUp] next turn (prioritizes the ally who killed that enemy)

simpleDesc.simpleDesc: Heal 3 SP
A random ally gains 2 Offense Level Up next turn

dataList.name: Devouring Cube
dataList.desc:
When an ally dies, gain 1 E.G.O resource for each of that ally's Skills 1 and 2.

After Attack: if the enemy is killed, gain 1 random E.G.O resource (once per Skill)

simpleDesc.simpleDesc: Gain 1 random E.G.O resource

dataList.name: Mask of the Parade
dataList.desc:
In Encounters where backup enemies appear: when new enemies enter the battle, inflict 3 [Laceration] and +2 [Laceration] Count against them.

If there is a <Bloodfiend> among allies: when new enemies enter the battle, activate [Laceration] on all enemies and reduce their [Laceration] Count by 1

simpleDesc.simpleDesc: Inflict 3 Bleed and +2 Bleed Count against backup enemies entering battle
Activate Bleed once on all enemies (reduce their Bleed Count by 1)

dataList.name: Mask of the Parade+
dataList.desc:
In Encounters where backup enemies appear: when new enemies enter the battle, inflict 5 [Laceration] and +3 [Laceration] Count against them.

If there is a <Bloodfiend> among allies: when new enemies enter the battle, activate [Laceration] on all enemies and reduce their [Laceration] Count by 1

simpleDesc.simpleDesc: Inflict 5 Bleed and +3 Bleed Count against backup enemies entering battle
Activate Bleed once on all enemies (reduce their Bleed Count by 1)
